articles.description: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim labels his team "maybe the worst" in the entire history of the club after a 3-1 defeat by Brighton.
articles.title: Manchester United 1-3 Brighton: Ruben Amorim says this is 'maybe the worst team in Man Utd history'

articles.description: The Philadelphia Eagles move to within one game of the Super Bowl after holding on for a thrilling win in the snow against the Los Angeles Rams.
articles.title: NFL play-off results: Philadelphia Eagles hold on to beat Los Angeles Rams

articles.description: Ella Toone enjoys a derby to remember with a hat-trick for Manchester United but it was a night to forget for Manchester City goalkeeper Khiara Keating.
articles.title: Ella Toone's dream derby for Man Utd but nightmare for Man City keeper Khiara Keating

articles.description: Former Everton midfielder Leon Osman explains how David Moyes' determination rubs off on his players, and why Sunday's win over Tottenham had hallmarks of his best Toffees teams.
articles.title: Everton: 'Aggression, energy, desire' - how David Moyes is motivating Toffees, again

articles.description: After a dreadful run of form during November and December, Manchester City looked more like their old selves as they thrashed Ipswich 6-0 on Sunday.
articles.title: Are Manchester City back to their best?

articles.description: Shaun Murphy dominates the opening session of the Masters final to establish a 6-2 lead over world champion Kyren Wilson at Alexandra Palace.
articles.title: Masters snooker final 2025: Shaun Murphy leads Kyren Wilson 6-2 in Masters final

articles.description: Novak Djokovic claims a convincing victory against Jiri Lehecka to set up a mouth-watering quarter-final against Carlos Alcaraz at the Australian Open.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Novak Djokovic beats Jiri Lehecka to set up quarter-final with Carlos Alcaraz

articles.description: Three-time winners Saracens fall to a shock 32-24 defeat by Castres as they miss out on a home tie in the last 16 of the Champions Cup.
articles.title: Saracens 24-32 Castres: Sarries miss out on home Champions Cup tie after shock defeat

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Real Madrid vs Las Palmas in the Spanish La Liga
articles.title: Real Madrid vs Las Palmas: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Cyriel Dessers scores goals but missed chances have cast his Rangers future in doubt. So where does the striker stand?
articles.title: Rangers: The two sides of 'bulletproof' striker Cyriel Dessers
